alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Valley; Palo Verde Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 9:18PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Paz, San Bernardino and Riverside Counties through 1000 PM MST/1000 PM PDT/... At 918 PM MST/918 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Midland, or 23 miles southwest of Parker, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes CA Route 95 between mile markers 12 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
